column4: hi peops back again, followed all the tuts that the bot sent me but none are relevant. Im looking to get counter strike source server to start on boot on my ubuntu sevrer machine. any help is much appreciated
Humm, I suggest having a look at guides in other places. I have a Left 4 Dead server running currently. One moment please.
http://www.cstrike-planet.com/tutorial/1-Linux-Install-CS-Source/5 <- This should do. I've worked with that myself; let me know if you need any further assistance. :)
It was the first result for "CS: Source Linux Server" ;)
